ಒಕ್ಕಲಮಕ್ಕಳು okkala makkaḷu (pl.) people engaged in farming; agriculturists; farmers; ಒಕ್ಕಲು ತೆಗೆ/ ತೆರಳು) okkalu tege/teraḷu to move from one place to settle at another place (usu. en masse); ಯಾವ ಊರ ಒಕ್ಕಲು ಎಂದು ಕೇಳದಿರು yāva ūra okkalu endu kēḷadiru not to ask about a person's plight; to deliberately ignore taking care of a person's welfare.
= ಒಕ್ಕಲಿಗಿತಿ.
= ಒಕ್ಕಲಿರು.
the act or fact of living together; a family-life.
the act, profession or art of farming; agriculture.
a temporary holding of a land by a tenant; tenancy.
a tax levied on farming; an agriculture-tax.
= ಒಕ್ಕಲುಹೋಗು.
to move from one place to settle at another place.
= ಒಕ್ಕಲುಹೋಗು.
to cause a person to leave one's place of living.
= ಒಕ್ಕಲುಹೋಗು.
the business of operating a farm; farming; agriculture.
= ಒಕ್ಕಲುತನ.
to be engaged in farming; to cultivate; to farm.
= ಒಕ್ಕಲುದೆಱೆ.
= ಒಕ್ಕಲುಹೋಗು.
= ಒಕ್ಕೊಳಗ.
a time or duration; a period; a season.
a single leg or foot.
any of the four equal parts of something; a fourth; a quarter.
ಓದು ಒಕ್ಕಾಲು, ಬುದ್ಧಿ ಮುಕ್ಕಾಲು ōdu okkālu, buddhi mukkālu working knowledge is more important than mere book learning.
to beat or strike with or as with a flail; to thresh heavily.
a separating of grains from the harvested crop, by threshing; a threshing.
to beat or strike with or as with a flail; to thresh heavily.
to spread or scatter about here and there; to spill out.
to cause to assemble, join together.
to cause to separate grains from harvested crop by threshing; to cause to thresh.
to separate grains from harvested crop by threshing; to thresh.
(dial.) to dig, weed, etc. with a hoe; to hoe; to till.
to move as a liquid does; to move in a stream, like water; to flow.
the act of separating the grains from hay or harvested crop.
an omen that foretells beforehand; something that portends an event either good or evil; portent.
(a nursery term) sleep; sleeping.
a long stick used to thresh grain; a flail.
that much quantity which can be held in the hallow of both palms joined together.
an eye that is large and round.

(dial.) a kind of liquid food made using butter-milk and the thick liquid got while boiling the rice.
(food served) to become excess; to remain in the dining plate.
quantity or number that is more than usual or required; abundance; excessiveness.
= ಒಕ್ಕೊಳಗ.
= ಒಕ್ಕೊರಳು.

a federation - a) an association or alliance of individuals, groups or nations formed for achieving a common purpose; b) an organisation formed by such an act; league; esp. a federal union of states, nations, etc.; a federal government.
to join together; to become one.
a single mast (of a shape).
a single hand.
